amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in House Report 115-785 to remove $50 million from the Strategic Capabilities Office (0604250D8Z), and provides $50 million to be used for directed energy solutions for boost phase missile defense, specifically the DPAL program with Technology Maturation Initiatives (0604115C).

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Langevin amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Langevin.
